About DeepTraffic

This app is a part of a school project. The project\'s goal is to get familiar with machine learning, Tensorflow and Android. In the first phase of the project several neural networks were trained to recognize traffic signs. This app leverages these models to classify photographs.

How to use

To get started, press the TAKE A PHOTO button at the bottom left. That will open your default camera app and let you take a picture. When capturing a photo of a traffic sign, please make sure it covers most of the picture and is centered both horizontaly and verticaly. After confirmation, the photo will be cropped to a square and displayed at the top of the screen. The tensorflow models will classify the photo and the top prediction along with it\'s certainty will be displayed underneath it. You can use the spinner at the bottom right to toggle between models. Press the (i) icon in the top right corner if you need any help.

Models

  •   Convolution - network with two convolution + pooling layers and two fully-connected layers
  •   Simple - simple network with three fully-connected layers
  •   MobileNetV2 - retrained Tensorflow Hub module, originally trained on ImageNet
